Title: Varnam
Writer: Raju Sivasankaran M, Krishna da Vinci
Actors: Giri Daran, Mounika, Sampath Raj, Vijay Sethupathi
Plot: Varnam is the story of seventeen year old Mani learning that privilege and prejudice have a price. Mani's uncle Durai exploits the helpless lower caste farmers. Mani's teacher Kavitha ...
